column5: Went out ice fishin for crappie & gills on Sunday...& ended up also getting a suprise pike!    Awesome fight on the UL setup!
i can jsut imagine the fight on some light tackle! nice pic
Nice bonus fish.......kudos for not getting bit off
I'll take that kinda surprise any day of the week.  -R-
Nice! Wish I had some ice!

I can actually relate to your experience JMahon.  Last winter on Simcoe I was jigging a little #2 Jiggin' Rap with 3 1/2 pound test and hooked into a pike.  Man, when that reel starts to peel, you really hold your breath, eh!  Everything has to work out just right.  So what was the size of the hole you drilled?  6-inch?  That usually becomes a bit of a trick too!
that is a very respectable pike too, nice job (and a bit of luck not getting bit off)
Nice surprise for sure Got to hate that when it happens  Good job JMahon and thanks for sharing Leechman
what a blast! On light tackle that must've been fun  did ya eat it?

Oh ya, it was definately a blast with the UL tackle!   I was fishing out of an 8" hole...so I had a lil more leeway to get his head up!   & No, I didn't eat him...he's back out there waiting to be caught again sometime!
